Elle souhaite renforcer d’avantage ses stocks et devenir compétitif sur la marché grâce aux crédits de l’institution. Ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et épargner de l’argent à coté.
texts.en: Ndeye Thioutiou is a 58-year old woman who lives in the district where the branch lies. She is married and a mother, but she does not have any particular responsibilities because her children take care of the family's daily outgoings. She does not have any relatives benefiting from loans from the institution. She has five years' experience and is requesting this loan to buy and sell "Thioub" and "Wax" fabrics. She begins her day at nine o'clock in the morning and finishes at eight in the evening. She would like to increase her stock further and become competitive in the market as a result of loans from the institution. She would thereby be able to increase her income and put some money aside in her savings.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothes for resale.

loans.name: Rabian

texts.en:
Photographed here are Rabian and her husband, Festim, from the city of Korce in the southeast of the country. 
 
A little amount of 60,000 ALL (Albanian Lek) will help to pay for a medical checkup for Festim, who has been suffering from organ disease since he was young.
 
They are both retired and have no other income than their pensions, but their 40 and 35-year-old married children would assist them financilally should it be necessary.

Rabian said during her conversation with the Branch Mananger, 'We are both retirees and we’ve got no other income but our pensions. However we promise to the lenders that we will pay back the loan in full. We are both responsible people, and this has been proved through our five previous loans.'

loans.use: to pay for her husband's heart checkup with a specialist

loans.name: Agno  Ablavi

texts.fr: ABLAVI est mariée avec trois enfants et âgée 30 ans, elle vend des produits d’alimentation générale devant son domicile et s’approvisionne six fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé. Elle n’a pas de moyen de déplacement, mais dispose d’un poste de télévision et de radio, habite le quartier Adakpamé. ABLAVI sollicite un crédit pour gagner plus de bénéfices et aussi faire face à la concurrence car il y a plusieurs personnes qui ont tendance à vendre la même chose qu’elle vend.
texts.en: Ablavi is 30 years old and married with three children. She sells groceries in front of her home and gets her supplies six times a month at Lomé's Grand Market. She does not have any means of transportation but has a small television and radio, and she lives in the Adakpamé district. Ablavi is requesting a loan so she can make more profit and also be able to face the competition, because there are several people who are selling the same products as her.

loans.use: to buy a sack of corn, a container of oil and a basket of tomatoes.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: AFI est commerçante des détergents qu’elle achète au grand marché de Lomé et les revend dans le quartier Adakpamé où habite. Elle est mariée avec six enfants et âgée de 32 ans, et s’approvisionne six fois par mois.AFI habite dans une maison qu’elle a loué et dont le toit est en tuiles, est analphabète et ne dispose pas de moyen de déplacement. Alors dans le but d’améliorer sa vente, de mieux épargner et aider son mari pour amoindrir les charges, AFI sollicite un crédit pour appuyer son commerce.
texts.en: Afi trades in detergents that she buys at Lomé's Grand Market and resells in the Adakpamé district where she lives. She is 32 years old and married with six children. She gets her supplies six times a month. Afi lives in a rented house with a tiled roof, she is illiterate and has no means of transportation. So, with the aim of improving her sales, saving more money and helping her husband to reduce expenses, Afi is requesting a loan to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy 11 sacks of Omo and five cartons of soap.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: AKOUVI est mariée et mère de trois enfants ; âgée de 31 ans, elle vend des pâtes dentifrices dans les environnants du quartier Adakpamé où elle habite et s’approvisionne six fois par mois. AKOUVI est logé dans une maison dont le toit est en tôle avec une latrine traditionnelle, un niveau d’étude primaire et ne dispose d’aucun moyen de déplacement. Dans le souci d’améliorer son quotidien et assurer son lendemain et celui de ses enfants, AKOUVI désire un microcrédit pour appuyer son commerce.
texts.en: Akouvi is married and mother to three children. She is 31 years old and sells toothpaste in the surroundings of Adakpamé where she lives and gets her supplies six times a month. Akovi lives in a house with a sheet metal roof and a traditional latrine. She has a primary school education and does not have any means of transportation. With a view to improving her daily live and providing for her own future as well as that of her children, Akouvi would like a microloan to boost up her business.

loans.use: to buy 25 packets of toothpaste.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy  habita de la ciudad de  Barranquilla, lugar ubicado en el departamento del Atlántico, después de haber trabajado 26 años en restaurantes y de haber tenido una larga trayectoria en este oficio, decidió iniciar su propio negocio aprovechando toda la experiencia obtenida en sus anteriores empleos. Actualmente cuenta con un restaurante que tiene 5 años de estar en funcionamiento, en él ofrece comida corriente de excelente calidad y a precios accesibles. Es por ello que en pro de mejorar el aspecto de su negocio, decidió hacer un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de sillas para ampliar la capacidad de su microempresa y materiales constructivos para realizarle adecuaciones al techo en sus instalaciones, con lo que mejorará  su imagen empresarial.   Su perspectiva a futuro es aperturar sucursales en la ciudad  de Barranquilla y conseguir brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, por eso trabaja de Lunes a Domingos, desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde, vendiendo de contado  y a crédito y comprando a mayoristas, para atender mejor a sus  clientes, que son principalmente sus vecinos, aunque su mayor desafío sea tener suficiente capital de trabajo para invertir y atender mucho mejor a sus clientela
texts.en: Nancy lives in the city of Barranquilla, a place located in the Atlantic department. After having worked 26 years in restaurants and having a long career in this field, she decided to open her own business, taking advantage of all the experience obtained in her previous jobs.  Currently, she has a restaurant that has been operating for 5 years. There, she offers typical meals of excellent quality and accessible prices. For this, she decided to improve the look of her business and decided to take out a loan to invest it in the purchase of seats to expand the capacity of her microbusiness and construction materials to make some enhancements to the roof in her rooms, with which she will improve her business image. Her view to the future is to open branches in the city of Barranquilla and be able to offer her family a better quality of life. For this reason she works from Monday to Sunday from 8 in the morning to 3 in the afternoon, selling in cash and credit, and purchasing from wholesalers, to serve her customers better, who are primarily her neighbors, though her greatest challenge is to have enough working capital to invest and attend her customers much better.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and construction materials.

loans.name: Gloria Stella

texts.es:
Está humilde mujer de 42 años quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido en dulces y snack, todo lo que tiene es ese humilde negocio que se puede apreciar en la foto y gracias a este puede llevar un alimento a su hogar.
Es madre de 2 hijos de 18 y 25 años de edad que viven con ella y se levanta todos los días a sentarse en su puesto esperando a que sus clientes le compren algún producto y volver en la noche con una bolsa de alimentos para comer.
Con el crédito Gloria puede mejorar su negocio vender más productos, tener un carrito donde pueda ubicar variedad de productos y en conclusión está muy esperanzada con esta oportunidad de progreso que le están brindando.
texts.en:
This humble 42-year-old woman wants to ask for a loan to purchase a variety of candies and snacks, all of which she has in this humble business which can be appreciated in the photo and, thanks to which, she is able to bring food to her home.

She is the mother of 2 children, ages 18 and 25 years old, who live with her and she gets up every day to sit at her stand waiting for her customers to buy some product, and to come back at night with a bag of food to eat.

With the loan, Gloria will be able to improve her business, selling more products and to have a cart where she can place a variety of products, and in the end she is very hopeful with this opportunity to progress that has been offered to her.

loans.use: to purchase sweets and a variety of products, basically snacks; she looks to improve her economic situation and offer more products.

loans.name: Mahasen

texts.en:
Mahasen is a 57-year-old widowed mother of six children who has been working baking special Saj bread from her house.  She has been doing this since her husband passed away, to cover her family's increasing living needs.

In 2008, Mahasen started her own Saj bread baking business, and since that time, she has been working hard to develop it as much as she can. But, her family's needs are increasing, and unfortunately she can't afford saving extra money for future investments. 

Thus, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to buy a needed electric dough mixer to develop her business, and pay the necessary school tuition fees for two of her children.

Mahasen hopes that one day she can afford to move her business outside her house, so she can provide her children a healthy and safe living place, and at the same time attract more customers and increase her production.

loans.use: To buy a needed electric dough mixer to develop her business, and to pay necessary school tuition fees for two of her children.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar es un hombre divorciado a cargo de un hijo. Edgar vive en El Alto en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a sus padres pero al menos vive con comodidad Edgar se gana la vida como electricista y quiere un prestamo para la refaccion de un ambiente en la casa paterna para poder ganar un porcentaje por el cobro de alquileres (puesto que Edgar va a invertir en la casa de sus padres), de esa manera el cliente tendra una mejora en sus ingresos Edgar tiene buena salud y su actividad es estable
texts.en: Edgar is a divorced man, with one child in his care. Edgar lives in El Alto in an adobe house that belongs to his parents but at least he lives in comfort. Edgar earns his living as an electrician and wants a loan to do some repairs to a space in his parents' house to be able to earn a percentage of what is charged in rent (since Edgar is going to invest in his parents' house). In this way, the client will have an increase in his income. Edgar is healthy and his work is stable.

loans.use: to do some repairs to a space in his parents' house to be able to earn a percentage of what is charged in rent.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds and other items
